attributes.action: Reform political campaigning regulations to ban the use of misleading propaganda
attributes.additional_details: This petition proposes a reform on political campaigning guidance to prevent such underhand tactics being used in future public votes & elections.
attributes.background: The EU referendum's leave campaign was based predominantly on misleading & hate inciting propaganda alongside misused imagery that was based on untruths and lies. The misrepresentation of information has led many of the public to be duped into making a decision they now wish they could withdraw.
